name: Total Mayhem
description: Extreme dares only the bold attempt. Weaklings, don't even try!

dares.title: Spicy Truth
dares.action: ${c_player}, eat something spicy without water.

dares.title: Street Scream
dares.action: ${c_player}, go outside and shout, 'I love my mom!' at the top of your lungs.

dares.title: Cold Shower
dares.action: ${c_player}, douse yourself with cold water for 10 seconds.

dares.title: Reverse Strip
dares.action: ${c_player}, put on every piece of clothing you can find in the room at once.

dares.title: Madman Dance
dares.action: ${c_player}, perform the craziest dance you can on the table.

dares.title: Weighted Push-Ups
dares.action: ${c_player}, do 10 push-ups while balancing any object on your back.

dares.title: Surprise Confession
dares.action: ${c_player}, call someone and confess something unexpected.

dares.title: Chew the Unchewable
dares.action: ${c_player}, chew on something inedible (paper, napkin, etc.).

dares.title: Savage Cocktail
dares.action: ${c_player}, drink a cocktail of three random ingredients picked by the others.

dares.title: Max Volume
dares.action: ${c_player}, belt out any song for 15 seconds at full volume.

dares.title: Extreme Make-Up
dares.action: ${c_player}, let the others give you the wildest make-up look ever.

dares.title: Mirror Hype
dares.action: ${c_player}, loudly praise yourself in the mirror for 20 seconds.

dares.title: Window Dancer
dares.action: ${c_player}, dance by the window so passers-by can see you.

dares.title: Bold Post
dares.action: ${c_player}, post a weird photo to your socials right now.

dares.title: Crazy Compliment
dares.action: ${c_player}, give a heartfelt compliment to a wall—or any object.

dares.title: Awkward Call
dares.action: ${c_player}, call a friend and ask to borrow a large sum of money.

dares.title: Fake Panic Attack
dares.action: ${c_player}, act out a panic attack for 15 seconds.

dares.title: Street Serenade
dares.action: ${c_player}, run outside and sing the chorus of your favorite song.

dares.title: Trust Test
dares.action: ${c_player}, close your eyes and let ${r_player} feed you something unknown.

dares.title: Minute of Humility
dares.action: ${c_player}, get on your knees and apologize to a chair.

dares.title: Gross Mix
dares.action: ${c_player}, mix the 4 strangest drinks around and take a sip.

dares.title: Loudest Laugh
dares.action: ${c_player}, laugh as loud and crazy as you can.

dares.title: Inside-Out Outfit
dares.action: ${c_player}, wear your clothes backwards and keep them on for 10 minutes.

dares.title: Tasty Dirt
dares.action: ${c_player}, lick the sole of your own shoe.

dares.title: Custom Meltdown
dares.action: ${c_player}, have a one-minute meltdown with tears and screams.

dares.title: Real Slap Boxing
dares.action: ${c_player}, let ${r_player} give you a light slap.

dares.title: Object Kiss
dares.action: ${c_player}, passionately kiss a random object chosen by the group.

dares.title: Parent Confession
dares.action: ${c_player}, text your parents and tell them you love them.

dares.title: Ridiculous Headgear
dares.action: ${c_player}, wear underwear on your head for 5 minutes.

dares.title: Street Jumps
dares.action: ${c_player}, go outside and do 10 loud jumps.

dares.title: Random Video
dares.action: ${c_player}, record a silly video and send it to a random contact.

dares.title: Shock Tale
dares.action: ${c_player}, tell a made-up shocking story as convincingly as possible.

dares.title: Weird Challenge
dares.action: ${c_player}, challenge anyone to the strangest contest you can think of.

dares.title: Dare of Dares
dares.action: ${c_player}, let the group pick a punishment for you.

dares.title: Wild Photo Shoot
dares.action: ${c_player}, take 5 of the weirdest photos possible and drop them in the group chat.

dares.title: Blunt Question
dares.action: ${c_player}, answer ${r_player}'s most awkward question honestly.

dares.title: Window Singer
dares.action: ${c_player}, sing loudly out the window for 10 seconds.

dares.title: Animal Instinct
dares.action: ${c_player}, act like any animal for 30 seconds.

dares.title: Banana Kiss
dares.action: ${c_player}, eat a banana as seductively as possible.

dares.title: Abduction Cry
dares.action: ${c_player}, yell out the window that you've been kidnapped!

dares.title: Electro Dance
dares.action: Everyone dances like they've been zapped. First to stop drinks.

dares.title: Pain Orchestra
dares.action: Each player pretends to be a musical instrument—using only their mouth. Quietest drinks!

dares.title: Mass Hysteria
dares.action: Everyone acts out a loud freak-out for 15 seconds. Laugh and you drink.

dares.title: Strange March
dares.action: March in a circle using the weirdest pose you can imagine for 20 seconds.

dares.title: Chaos Chant
dares.action: On three, everyone screams the word 'chaos' together. Forget? Drink.

dares.title: Wardrobe Swap
dares.action: Everyone must put on someone else's item. Fail and drink.

dares.title: Noisy Wave
dares.action: Do a stadium wave with screams. Mess up and drink.

dares.title: Edible or Not
dares.action: Name objects in turn. Call something oddly edible? Drink.

dares.title: Friendship Jumps
dares.action: Everyone does 10 jumps in place. Do fewer? Drink.

dares.title: Group Confession
dares.action: All at once confess one embarrassing thing. Stay silent? Drink.

dares.title: Silly Faces
dares.action: Pull your craziest face for 15 seconds. The dullest drinks.

dares.title: Team Roar
dares.action: Roar together for 10 seconds. Giggle and you drink.

dares.title: Truth Gauntlet
dares.action: Ask any question around the circle. Refuse to answer? Drink.

dares.title: Catwalk Chaos
dares.action: Strut with a random item balanced on your head. Refuse? Drink.

dares.title: Hug Your Frenemy
dares.action: Hug someone you haven't spoken to tonight. Can't do it? Drink.

dares.title: Silent Stare
dares.action: Silently stare at each other for 20 seconds. First to laugh drinks.

dares.title: Group Shame
dares.action: Each tells an embarrassing story. Can't? Drink.

dares.title: Surreal Karaoke
dares.action: Everyone sings different songs at once for 20 seconds. Stop early? Drink.

dares.title: Chaos Leap
dares.action: All leap wildly into the center. Least energetic drinks.

dares.title: Stare of Madness
dares.action: Lock eyes with crazy faces for 10 seconds. First blink drinks.

dares.title: Spoon of Fire
dares.action: ${c_player}, eat a spoonful of the hottest sauce ${r_player} can find.

dares.title: Dark Shout
dares.action: ${c_player}, turn off the lights and yell 'I'm here!' three times without waiting for a reply.

dares.title: Ice Grip
dares.action: ${c_player}, hold an ice cube until it fully melts.

dares.title: Midnight Sprint
dares.action: ${c_player}, dash outside, run around the house, then hop back in.

dares.title: Under-Table Crawl
dares.action: ${c_player}, crawl under the table to the other side of the room.

dares.title: Ridiculous Make-Up
dares.action: ${c_player}, let ${r_player} give you the silliest make-up look.

dares.title: Glass Kiss
dares.action: ${c_player}, passionately kiss a window or mirror.

dares.title: Opera Voice
dares.action: ${c_player}, sing any phrase in an operatic voice.

dares.title: Savage Joke
dares.action: ${c_player}, tell the harshest joke you know.

dares.title: Mud Dance
dares.action: ${c_player}, pretend you're dancing in mud for 20 seconds.

dares.title: Napkin Snack
dares.action: ${c_player}, chew a napkin and declare, 'Delicious!'

dares.title: Group Reverse Strip
dares.action: Everyone puts on one extra item over their clothes. Last one drinks.

dares.title: Run in Place
dares.action: Everyone jogs in place for 30 seconds. First to stop drinks.

dares.title: Loud Laughter
dares.action: Laugh out loud together for 15 seconds. Stop and drink.

dares.title: Ice Wave
dares.action: Touch your forehead and say 'cold!' together. Silent one drinks.

dares.title: Team Shout
dares.action: On three, yell 'Mayhem!' together. Mess up and drink.

dares.title: Extreme Pose
dares.action: Freeze in the most uncomfortable pose for 20 seconds. Move and drink.

dares.title: Whisper Squad
dares.action: Whisper 'adrenaline' together. Speak louder and drink.

dares.title: Risk Group
dares.action: All name the most extreme thing they've done. Can't name one? Drink.
